name: Loop Dungeon
description:
Loop Dungeon

Loop Dungeon is a top view puzzle game, inspired by the Majora’s Mask mechanics of going back in time. In this game you have 75 seconds to get all four orbs to their respective altars and be free of this endless loop.

Instructions:
  • WASD or Arrows to control the character (the hexagon).
  • Space to interact with the orbs/altars (pick/release/swap orbs).
  • R to rewind time and return to the start of the dungeon.

The Rewind mechanics lets you go back to the start of the dungeon reseting it to it’s original state, except for the the orb you are carrying, making it a strategic move in the game.

Entry for the Ludum Dare 47  COMPO - Theme: Stuck in a Loop
